MS: Which of the following are advantages of flip flops over latches?             Select all that apply.
column3: NOT HTML
FFs are less likely to produce undefined/unknown output
FFs only sample on the rising edge of the control signal
FFs can be used to remember what an input was a while ago
FFs can be set and reset
FFs can reflect changes in input instantly when they are enabled
